result.html: Bhí mé ag gearradh adhmaidI was cutting wood.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé ag gearraḋ aḋmaidI was cutting wood.

result.eng: The politicians must cut down on their expenses.
result.ga: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas
result.orig: Caithfidh na polaiteoirí gearradh siar ar a gcuid costas

result.ponchtml: Caiṫfiḋ na polaiteoirí gearraḋ siar ar a gcuid costasThe politicians must cut down on their expenses.

result.eng: I was given a fine on the spot.
result.ga: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthair
result.orig: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthair
result.html: Gearradh fíneáil orm ar an láthairI was given a fine on the spot.
result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ fíneáil orm ar an láṫairI was given a fine on the spot.

result.html: Gearradh fíneáil €100 ormI was fined €100.

result.html: Gearradh na sreanga teileagraifThe telegraph wires were cut.

result.html: Gearradh pionós géar orthuThey were punished harshly.

result.eng: He was sentenced to lifetime imprisonment.
